description: This course will look in depth at the mission, objectives, financial status and future financing plans of several non-profits and government agencies. The students will develop a template for analyzing both the management and finances of the organization and will learn first hand from senior managers about their problems and plans. GAFL 180 or permission of the instructor is a pre-requisite.
name: Case Studies in Financial Management of Nonprofit and Government Orgs

section.name: Case Studies in Financial Management of Nonprofit and Government Orgs

values.name: Case Studies in Financial Management of Nonprofit and Government Orgs
